trans-unit.source: Reminder Level %1 on Reminder Term %2 was not found.
trans-unit.target: Le niveau de relance %1 sur le terme de relance %2 est introuvable.
trans-unit.note: %1 = Reminder Level No., %2 = Reminder Term Code
Codeunit Reminder Communication - NamedType ReminderLevelNotFoundErr

trans-unit.source: Reminder Term %1 was not found.
trans-unit.target: Le terme %1 de la relance introuvable.
trans-unit.note: %1 = Reminder Term Code
Codeunit Reminder Communication - NamedType ReminderTermNotFoundErr

trans-unit.source: Issued Reminder Lines
trans-unit.target: Lignes relances
trans-unit.note: Page Issued Reminder Lines DrllDwn - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies the amount in the currency of the reminder.
trans-unit.target: Spécifie le montant dans la devise de la relance.
trans-unit.note: Page Issued Reminder Lines DrllDwn - Control Amount - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies an entry description, based on the contents of the Type field.
trans-unit.target: Spécifie une description d'écriture qui est basée sur le contenu du champ Type.
trans-unit.note: Page Issued Reminder Lines DrllDwn - Control Description - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the date when the related document was created.
trans-unit.target: Spécifie la date de création du document associé.
trans-unit.note: Page Issued Reminder Lines DrllDwn - Control Document Date - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the document number of the customer ledger entry this reminder line is for.
trans-unit.target: Spécifie le numéro du document de l'écriture comptable client à laquelle cette ligne relance se rapporte.
trans-unit.note: Page Issued Reminder Lines DrllDwn - Control Document No. - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the document type of the customer ledger entry this reminder line is for.
trans-unit.target: Spécifie le type du document de l'écriture comptable client à laquelle cette ligne relance se rapporte.
trans-unit.note: Page Issued Reminder Lines DrllDwn - Control Document Type - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the due date of the customer ledger entry this reminder line is for.
trans-unit.target: Spécifie la date d'échéance de l'écriture comptable client à laquelle cette ligne relance se rapporte.
trans-unit.note: Page Issued Reminder Lines DrllDwn - Control Due Date - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies a number that indicates the reminder level.
trans-unit.target: Spécifie un numéro qui indique le niveau de relance.
trans-unit.note: Page Issued Reminder Lines DrllDwn - Control No. of Reminders - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Reminder Level
trans-unit.target: Niveau relance
trans-unit.note: Page Issued Reminder Lines DrllDwn - Control No. of Reminders - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies the original amount of the customer ledger entry that this reminder line is for.
trans-unit.target: Spécifie le montant d'origine de l'écriture comptable client à laquelle cette ligne relance se rapporte.
trans-unit.note: Page Issued Reminder Lines DrllDwn - Control Original Amount - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the posting date of the customer ledger entry that this reminder line is for.
trans-unit.target: Spécifie la date de comptabilisation de l'écriture comptable client à laquelle cette ligne relance se rapporte.
trans-unit.note: Page Issued Reminder Lines DrllDwn - Control Posting Date - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the remaining amount of the customer ledger entry this reminder line is for.
trans-unit.target: Spécifie le montant ouvert de l'écriture comptable client à laquelle cette ligne relance se rapporte.
trans-unit.note: Page Issued Reminder Lines DrllDwn - Control Remaining Amount - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Reminder No.
trans-unit.target: Spécifie le N° de la relance.
trans-unit.note: Page Issued Reminder Lines DrllDwn - Control Reminder No. - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the posting date of the reminder.
trans-unit.target: Spécifie la date de la relance.
trans-unit.note: Page Issued Reminder Lines DrllDwn - Control Reminder Posting Date - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Filter invoices overdue or where %1 is greater than %2.
trans-unit.target: Filtre les factures dues ou dont "%1" est postérieure à "%2"".
trans-unit.note: %1:FieldName("Closed at Date"), %2:FieldName("Due Date")
PageExtension Customer Ledger Entries - Action Late Payment Invoices - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Late Payment Invoices
trans-unit.target: Paiement tardif
trans-unit.note: PageExtension Customer Ledger Entries - Action Late Payment Invoices - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies the posting date of the last Issued Reminder.
trans-unit.target: Spécifie la date de la dernière relance.

trans-unit.source: Last Issued Reminder Date
trans-unit.target: Date dern. relance
trans-unit.note: PageExtension Customer Ledger Entries - Control Last Issued Reminder Date - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the No. of Reminder Issued Entries field.
trans-unit.target: Spécifie le nombre de relances émises.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension Customer Ledger Entries - Control No. of Reminder Issued - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of days that have passed since the due date of the customer ledger entry.
trans-unit.target: Spécifie le nombre de jours de retard du paiement.

trans-unit.source: Late Payment Days
trans-unit.target: Retard (j)

trans-unit.source: Specifies the main text of the email, which appears between the greeting and the closing.
trans-unit.target: Spécifie le texte main du courrier électronique qui apparaît entre le message d’accueil et la clôture.

trans-unit.source: If you have already made the payment, please disregard this email. Thank you for your business.
trans-unit.target: Si vous avez déjà effectué le paiement, veuillez ignorer cet e-mail. Merci de votre collaboration.
